data.actual_result: Only the message was sent, the image was not.
data.expected_result: The message and image are sent together, like in portrait view.
data.short_description: Landscape Keyboard Send does not include attached images.
data.steps_to_repro: - Choose an image to send so it appears in the bottom. - Switch to landscape mode and type a message, then press done to send it (while still in landscape). - Notice only the text is sent, but the image was not.
